means: 收敛剂，止血药( astringent的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Other lines of attack include astringents and topical or oral medications.
sentence.Network_cn: 其它治疗手段包括收敛剂和局部或口服的药物治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Related products include antiperspirants, mouth washes, depilatories , astringents, and Bath crystals.
sentence.Network_cn: 以及防汗剂 、 漱口水、脱毛剂 、 指甲油 、 收敛剂和浴晶等.

sentence.Network_en: Chinese medicinal herbs with the main actions of inducing astringency and arresting discharge are called astringents.
sentence.Network_cn: 凡以收敛固涩为主要功效,常用以治疗滑脱不禁证的药物,称为收敛固涩药,也称收涩药或固涩药.

entry.def: An astringent is a liquid that you put on your skin to make it less oily or to make cuts stop bleeding.

example.ex: Sunset Boulevard was originally conceived by Wilder as an astringent satire on Hollywood.
example.tran: 怀尔德最初是想把《日落大道》拍成一部对好莱坞的辛辣讽刺片。

entry.def: If something has an astringent taste, it is sharp or bitter.

example.ex: The fruit has a tart and astringent flavour.
